item.description:
TIME AND DATE SUBJECT TO CHANGE FOR LABOR DAY WEEKEND...but the event is postponed from 8/29/2010.

Does tuna go best with red or white?

Usually you have to BYOB, but this time BYOS- just Bring Your Own SUSHI! This is a wonderful gorgeous place. It you have never beep you owe it to yourself. It is a gorgeous location where families come to picnic and drink the vineyard's own wine. People stay for hours, bring board games, books, etc. You can bring any food you want, but they ask you not to bring beverages. There are tables indoors and outdoors. There is a pond. It is really gorgeous, take my word for it!

Join us for a really casual, relaxed afternoon, with or without sushi.

http://www.gouveiavin...

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Bring Your Own Sushi (or not): A great different way to end the summer!
